title: Unable to create new project using quarkus maven plugin
body:
### Describe the bug

Following this guide: https://quarkus.io/guides/getting-started
and running:
```
mvn io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.4.1.Final:create \
    -DprojectGroupId=org.acme \
    -DprojectArtifactId=getting-started \
    -DclassName="org.acme.getting.started.GreetingResource" \
    -Dpath="/hello"
```

should result in a new project getting created. But I get:

```
Execution default-cli of goal io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.4.1.Final:create failed: No catalogs provided instead.
```

Few weeks ago, things are fine. Today I tried with 2.3.1.Final and 2.4.1.Final, both having the same issue.

### Expected behavior

New project should be created

### Actual behavior

Getting this error:

```
[INFO] Looking for the newly published extensions in registry.quarkus.io
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD FAILURE
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time:  36.720 s
[INFO] Finished at: 2021-11-10T15:41:44+08:00
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.4.1.Final:create (default-cli) on project standalone-pom: Execution default-cli of goal io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.4.1.Final:create failed: No catalogs provided -> [Help 1]
[ERROR]
[ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e switch.
[ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.
[ERROR]
[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles:
[ERROR] [Help 1] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/PluginExecutionException
```

### How to Reproduce?

1. Run this command:
```
mvn io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.4.1.Final:create \
    -DprojectGroupId=org.acme \
    -DprojectArtifactId=getting-started \
    -DclassName="org.acme.getting.started.GreetingResource" \
    -Dpath="/hello"
```

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin ip-192-168-0-124.ap-southeast-1.compute.internal 20.6.0 Darwin Kernel Version 20.6.0: Wed Jun 23 00:26:27 PDT 2021; root:xnu-7195.141.2~5/RELEASE_ARM64_T8101 arm64

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "11.0.12" 2021-07-20 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-11.0.12+7 (build 11.0.12+7) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-11.0.12+7 (build 11.0.12+7, mixed mode)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.4.1.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Maven home: /Users/rezakasyauqisabhara/Bengkel/apache-maven-3.8.3 Java version: 11.0.12, vendor: Eclipse Foundation, runtime: /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/temurin-11.jdk/Contents/Home Default locale: en_MY, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "mac os x", version: "11.5", arch: "x86_64", family: "mac"

### Additional information

with mvn `-X`:

```
[INFO] Looking for the newly published extensions in registry.quarkus.io
Downloading from registry.quarkus.io: https://registry.quarkus.io/maven/io/quarkus/registry/quarkus-platforms/1.0-SNAPSHOT/quarkus-platforms-1.0-20211110.012734-1.json
[DEBUG] Writing tracking file /Users/myhome/.m2/repository/io/quarkus/registry/quarkus-platforms/1.0-SNAPSHOT/quarkus-platforms-1.0-20211110.012734-1.json.lastUpdated

org.apache.maven.lifecycle.LifecycleExecutionException: Failed to execute goal io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.4.1.Final:create (default-cli) on project standalone-pom: Execution default-cli of goal io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.4.1.Final:create failed: No catalogs provided
```
